pacman.agents

Interface KeyboardControlledAgent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlledGhostAgent, ControlledPacmanAgent, UserControlledGhostAgent, UserControlledPacmanAgent

    public interface KeyboardControlledAgent
    This is a component that defines the behavior of a user controlled character (ghost/pacman) in the game with moving animations.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean aiTakeOver()
      Let AI takes over from the user.
      default void disableArrowKeyToControl(AbstractAgent component)
      Removes the binding between the arrow keys and moving shortcuts.
      default void removeKeyBindings(AbstractAgent component, int keyCode)
      Removes a hotkey with the action of changing the direction.
      default void setArrowKeyToControl(AbstractAgent component)
      Binds the arrow keys with moving shortcuts.
      default void setKeyBindings(AbstractAgent agent, Direction newDirection, int keyCode)
      Binds a hotkey with the action of changing the direction.

    • Method Detail

      • setArrowKeyToControl

        default void setArrowKeyToControl(AbstractAgent component)
        Binds the arrow keys with moving shortcuts.

      • setKeyBindings

        default void setKeyBindings(AbstractAgent agent,
                            Direction newDirection,
                            int keyCode)
        Binds a hotkey with the action of changing the direction.
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent component
        newDirection - the new direction specified by the user
        keyCode - an int specifying the numeric code for a keyboard key

      • aiTakeOver

        boolean aiTakeOver()
        Let AI takes over from the user.
        Returns:
        true if the user is no longer in control and false otherwise
